lines.text: Hi Claude again... You remember I told you about my cousin when I was 15... Well the year after that I killed this kid Louie... bashed his head in with my Louieville slugger ha ha ha... I got away with it... ha ha... but, ah... I wanna apologize to Louie... I'm sorry Louie... ha ha ha...
Excuse me! It is not a gimmick! And it is not pretentious.
How'd ya like to help a guy win a pulitzer? Give me that name!
